articles.content: The San Francisco 49ers will not lose Josh Williams to the Jacksonville Jaguars. On Friday, the Jaguars announced they had hired Los Angeles Rams director of scouting James Gladstone as their general… [+1717 chars]

articles.title: 5 Things: Flyers vs. Oilers - NHL.com
articles.description: On Saturday, the Flyers will host Kris Knoblauch's defending Western Conference champion Edmonton Oilers (34-17-4).
articles.content: Returning from the 4 Nations Face-Off break, there are 25 games remaining in the 2024-25 regular season for John Tortorella's Philadelphia Flyers (24-26-7). On Saturday, the Flyers will host Kris Kno… [+5501 chars]

articles.author: Alex Bozich
articles.title: What to Expect: Indiana vs. Purdue - Inside the Hall
articles.description: Indiana returns from a lengthy break to face rival Purdue on Sunday afternoon at Simon Skjodt Assembly Hall. The Boilermakers are 19-8 overall, 11-5 in the Big Ten and have lost three straight games.
